sentences.sContent: We prepared ourselves for the long journey ahead.
sentences.sCn: 我们为将要开始的长途旅行做好了准备。

sentences.sContent: It was strange seeing ourselves on television.
sentences.sCn: 在电视上看到自己感觉很奇怪。

sentences.sContent: ...We are unsure of ourselves and want to be liked by everyone...
...has reduced our appetite for aimless adventures no longer have we the inclination to let ourselves wander through tields of knowledges...
...Eating food not cooked by ourselves can cause serious consequences...
...that　there are more avenues for us to entertain ourselves than ever before...
...master skills and train ourselves to be more patient...
...Although it hardly seems practical to trick ourselves into eating less...
...if we fool ourselves into believing we're not doing anything wrong...
...We feel disappointed in ourselves and ashamed...

phrases.pCn: 只限于咱们之间；秘密的

trans.tranOther: used by the person speaking to show that they and one or more other people are affected by their own action
